title: The Adventures of Hubert Wang: The Guiding Light

story.text: Hubert Wang discovers a strange amulet while producing a documentary about ancient artifacts. The amulet grants him the power to control light, guiding the lost or those in darkness safely back home.
He tests his newfound powers, successfully guiding a lost group of hikers back to their campsite during a dense, foggy evening.
Hubert spends the day learning more about his powers. He realizes that besides guiding people, he can also manipulate light to create blinding flashes or complete darkness if necessary.
A local crisis emerges as a blackout hits the city. Hubert uses his powers to light up essential areas, enabling emergency teams to work efficiently through the night.
Hubert becomes a hero in his community. News of his deeds spread, and he is approached by the mayor for a special commendation.
Using his powers, Hubert helps police catch a gang of thieves who had been operating under the cover of night, restoring peace and safety to the neighbourhood.
Hubert reflects on his week, deciding to use his powers to continue making documentaries, this time focusing on stories of other unsung heroes who bring light to the world.

ending: As the sun set on Sunday, Hubert Wang knew he was just beginning to explore the potential of his powers to bring light to the world.
moral: Even in the darkest times, there are always ways to bring light and guidance to those around us.
